CustomField.description: Value retriever for merge field in Email templates.
CustomField.formula: TEXT(Contact__r.Salutation) & " " & Contact__r.FirstName & " " & Contact__r.LastName & BR() & Contact__r.MailingStreet & BR() & Contact__r.MailingCity & " " & Contact__r.MailingState & " " & Contact__r.MailingPostalCode
CustomField.label: {hidden} ContactMailingAddr
